forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 12C. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 9C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 48F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
